question: Which famous building was illuminated with Mahatma Gandhi’s image along with his message?
explanation:
On Mahatma Gandhi's 151st birth anniversary, the world’s highest architecture Burj Khalifa tower in Dubai, United Arab Emirates was illuminated with Mahatma Gandhi’s image along with his message.
His famous quote ‘Peace between countries must rest on the solid foundation of love between individuals’ was displayed on the iconic tower.
